EmailTemplate.name: National - Additional Information Request
EmailTemplate.subject: DealChicken - Application Review
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi,
Thank you again for your interest in partnering with DealChicken. Unfortunately, we are unable to pull any information regarding your business through Dun and Bradstreet or Equifax.
In order to move forward, can you provide any additional information, such as the following?
Previous address Additional business address Business display name (DBA) Corporation types Previous owner(s)
Any additional information would be appreciated as well.
Thank you very much.
The DealChicken team
